Shanghai government, why could this not be also true of Zhang Chunqiao?In the eyes
of some Red Guards, if Zhang Chunqiao was in fact a secret agent, then this would
explain why he had vigorously opposed the seizure of power by the Red
Revolutionaries. Thinking that this was in fact the case, some Red Guard groups
